author: nspiegelberg
msg: [master] Tool for region placement optionally enforces rack policy
Explicit region placement may be desired in situations where the 2-rack
policy for three replicas cannot be satisfied. The region placement tool
takes an optional parameter which indicates whether or not to enforce
Test Plan: Run on a cluster

author: nspiegelberg
msg: [master] BaseScanner only reads favored nodes if enabled
If the cluster is not balancing regions using the assignment load
balancer, then the base scanner should also not read the favored node
Test Plan: Run on a cluster
